com.tutego.jrtf

Class RtfPara

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tutego.jrtf.RtfPara
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RtfRow, RtfTextPara

    public abstract class RtfPara
extends java.lang.Object
    Build a paragraph or a table row.

        public RtfPara()

    • Method Detail

      • p

        public static RtfTextPara p(java.lang.Object... texts)
        Builds a paragraph of objects (with will be converted to Strings) and RtfText. Convenience method for p(RtfText.text(texts)).
        Parameters:
        texts - Text to set in paragraph.
        Returns:
        New RtfTextPara object with text.

      • p

        public static RtfTextPara p(RtfText... texts)
        A paragraph with a collection of text. This paragraph will inherit all the settings from the other paragraph. Look for pard(RtfText...) if you look for a method where paragraph attributes are not inherited to the next paragraph.
        Parameters:
        texts - Text to set in paragraph.
        Returns:
        New RtfTextPara object with text.

      • pard

        public static RtfTextPara pard(RtfText... texts)
        A paragraph with a collection of text. This paragraph will not inherit the settings from the other paragraph. Look for p(RtfText...) if you look for a method where paragraph attributes are inherited to the next paragraph.
        Parameters:
        texts - Text to set in paragraph.
        Returns:
        New RtfTextPara object with text.

      • ul

        public static RtfPara ul(java.lang.String text)
        Text is in a unordered list with a preceding bullet.
        Parameters:
        text - Text to set in paragraph.
        Returns:
        New RtfPara object with text and bullet.

      • ul

        public static RtfPara ul(RtfText text)
        Text is in a unordered list with a preceding bullet.
        Parameters:
        text - Text to set in paragraph.
        Returns:
        New RtfPara object with text and bullet.

      • row

        public static RtfRow row(RtfText... cells)
        Writes a row with a sequence of text cells.
        Parameters:
        cells - Cells of the row.
        Returns:
        New row object.

      • row

        public static RtfRow row(java.lang.Object... cells)
        Writes a row with a sequence of text cells. Every object is converted to String and wrapped to a paragraph with the method p(Object...).
        Parameters:
        cells - Cells of the row.
        Returns:
        New row object.

      • row

        public static RtfRow row(RtfPara... cells)
        Writes a row with a sequence of paragraph cells.
        Parameters:
        cells - Cells of the row.
        Returns:
        New object for the row.
